## Summit
#### Topics
::: {.smallest}
- **dev good practices**: nf-test, nf-core tools, green algorithms & env impact of pipelines, nf-nomad  and other plugins, SQL integration, pipeline benchmarking.
- **community**: examples from academia, pharma, biotech and tech companies (mainly experience sharing, describing different approaches).
- **training and teaching**: focus on how to engage people of diverse backgrounds, levels and availability.
- **regulation**: regulatory issues related to clinical applications.
- **tech trend**: Nextflow LSP and Seqera AI.
- **helping people grow professionally**: open science foundation, paths of success discussion.
:::
